actions.description: The echo makes two Tentacle attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Tentacle

specialTraits.description: The echo has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: When one of the echo's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.
specialTraits.name: Wakeful
